content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1564515838239{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1573232365997{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

You’ve heard the buzz, but what’s MarTech Stack Optimization really all about?

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1585067928531{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]In this new, easy-to-digest infographic, you’ll learn how marketing agencies are working to create more integrated MarTech stacks — and what they see coming next.

SharpSpring recently partnered with Ascend2 to help provide clarity on this often discussed and often misunderstood, industry hot topic. We surveyed top marketing agencies about the current state of their MarTech stacks — how they’re using them, what they’re prioritizing, and what they think is coming.

From what’s working, to what matters most, when it comes to MarTech optimization, download our infographic and discover:

  • Strategies for success & the most valuable features
  • What’s important when getting started
  • Top agency barriers to success
  • How to allocate time and resources
  • And much more…

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”custom-testimonial”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
